name: Jetstream Edge Ballpoint Pen / uni Mitsubishi Pencil

images.alt: Jetstream Edge Ballpoint Pen in black color

description: Challenging the limits of oil-based ballpoint pens, the Jetstream Edge pen features an ultra-fine 0.28mm ball diameter for a precise writing experience and a narrow “Point Tip” shape, allowing you to see the tip of the pen clearly when writing.

images.alt: Jetstream Edge Ballpoint Pen in black color
Jetstream Edge Ballpoint Pen in champagne gold color
Jetstream Edge Ballpoint Pen in navy color
Jetstream Edge Ballpoint Pen in white red color

name: Calme Ballpoint Pen / Pentel

images.alt: Calme Ballpoint Pen in beige color

description: A new smooth oil-based ballpoint pen with a design that harmonizes with people, featuring a quiet knock sensation, a leather-like long grip, and a matte texture. Because it is an oil-based ballpoint pen that is used daily, the design has been carefully considered to ensure that it not only feels comfortable for the user, but also blends in with the people and environment around them.

images.alt: Calme Ballpoint Pen in beige color
Calme Ballpoint Pen in black color

Calme Ballpoint Pen in grayish white color
Calme Ballpoint Pen in khaki color
Calme Ballpoint Pen in turquoise blue color

name: Calme Ballpoint Pen / Pentel

images.alt: Calme Ballpoint Pen in pure black color

description: The Ball Sign iD has taken on a matte texture and an even higher quality, making its new debut as the 'Ball Sign iD Plus'. You can choose your preferred shade of black from the three black inks available and express your individuality.

images.alt: Calme Ballpoint Pen in pure black color
Calme Ballpoint Pen in night black color
Calme Ballpoint Pen in forest black color

name: Kuru Toga Advance Upgrade Mechanical Pencil / Mitsubishi Pencil

images.alt: Kuru Toga Advance Upgrade Mechanical Pencil in gunmetal color
Kuru Toga Advance Upgrade Mechanical Pencil side view
Kuru Toga Advance Upgrade Mechanical Pencil writing sample

description: The density and thickness of the characters remain consistent. The Sharp 'ADVANCE' series that allows you to write beautiful characters. It's the 'ADVANCE Upgrade Model' featuring a stylish punched grip.

name: MS01 Mechanical Pencil / OHTO

images.alt: MS01 Mechanical Pencil in black color
MS01 Mechanical Pencil close-up view

description: Known for its various adjustable parts and weighty body, the MS01's drafting mechanical pencil has an all-metal build that accentuates the beauty of its design and mechanisms.
